reviews.review: игра стала высранным дерьмом в котором каждый 3 маньяк играет с читами и не в первый раз,так постоянно,маньяк тупо за 2 минуты ложит всех и вешает на 20 ранге без каких либо предметов и способностей и бегает тупо за выжившими по всей карте,насколько я понял вам глубоко насрать на безопасность игры что каждый 5 игрок может скачать читы и тп на игру

The game has always had a rocky development cycle. Since 2016 I've played this and no longer get any enjoyment out of it. The game has lived long past its lifespan, and only exists as a giant content dump where they keep throwing DLC onto a mile long list of bugs, glitches, and exploits. Most of your big streamers aren't playing this game anymore either because its fun, but because its their job. DbD doesn't support long term players, and serves to only reward those new players who don't want to improve their gameplay. Developers also have a bad habit at this point of not playing, or understanding their own game, and making decisions based off erroneous data
blight go brrrrr

Incredibly addicting and can be very challenging. But be aware that if you play as killer you WILL be harassed and mocked by the survivors, which is hella off-putting when you're a newbie. Pro tip: Disable the chat by clicking on the two arrows >> next to it, and it will automatically stay disabled until you turn it back on. That way you can avoid a lot of toxicity.

真是越改越垃圾 打击如果你是希望人类顶着残血速修 那你完全就改成不能修机互动 修机互动就打击秒没还可以理解 现在屠夫直接是看人救下来 过一会等人类自摸了一小会屠夫就来打针对了 自摸都不让摸是吗 每一把就几千分出门 那请问制作组出这个打击有什么用呢 打击不就是防止屠夫打针对吗 现在只要一进去全是守尸打针对的屠夫 能不能对中国玩家友好一点 服务器不建就算了 每天顶着延迟打 还要被屠夫打针对守尸 有意思吗 玩了两千小时真的劝退

Хрен поиграешь нормально!
Не портьте нервы, не покупайте!

Eigentlich finde ich das Spielprinzip super und vor dem letzten Patch vom 10. hätte ich es auch meinen Freunden empfohlen. Das hat sich jetzt aber geändert. Ich werde kein gutes Wort verlieren bis der letzte Patch wieder raus genommen wird. Das für den Mist jemand bezahlt wurde ist ein absoluter Skandal und ich dafür Geld ausgegeben habe ein noch größerer.

EDIT: Nach ein paar weiteren Runden kann ich sagen, wer für diesen Mist Geld bezahlt ist selber Schuld.
Die Entwickler schert die Community einen feuchten Dreck, nur schlechte Entscheidungen. Matchmaking ist ein Witz, also nicht vorhanden. Community ist mehr als nur toxic, mobben sich gegenseitig wo es nur geht.
Eine Rückerstattung meines weitaus besser einsetzbaren Geldes ist beantragt.
Ich rate vehement vom kauf dieses Spiels ab.

Esse jogo é repleto de bugs e más escolhas dos desenvolvedores em praticamente todos os seus aspectos. Ele com certeza vai te garantir algumas dezenas ou centenas de horas de diversão e, principalmente, estresse.
Se tudo o que procura é um jogo para dedicar um bom tempo, é uma boa escolha, porém, quando você joga o suficiente, os problemas pesão demais para você considerar-lo um bom jogo.

За 94 часа игры я повстречал многое: увлекающихся спортом выживших, которые очень быстро умеют приседать перед киллером; киллеров, которые влюблялись в меня, да и в других членов команды, так как смотрели им прямо в глаза, пока тот висел на крюке. В общем - игра очень хорошая. 10 приседаний из 10.
É um bom jogo, mas devido a sua comunidade, não deve ser levado tão a sério. Dá para se divertir muito, principalmente jogando com amigos. Eu recomendo.
Devs don't give a crap about the community, game is in a broken state, balance changes either come in late or don't come at all. Currently a trainwreck of a game and not worth playing.
Jogo muito bom, viciante, mas tem muitos bugs e você pode se tiltar por causa disso e behaviour nunca se pronuncia sobre e demora para arrumar os bugs. Você sendo uma pessoa calma.

Fun game but it's plagued by numerous issues such as, long waiting times, abysmal bloodpoint gain, lackluster progression when unlocking new killers or survivors (roughly 60 hours for one), annoying dlc release model, overpriced cosmetics that fit a F2P model when you've you've already paid for the game, awful matchmaking, and non-existent balancing team.

Oyun katil ve kurban arasında çok dengeli bu yandan çok iyi  fakat facecamp-tunnel yemedikçe veya yapmadıkça oyun aşırı zevkli .  Genelde oyunu arkadaşlarınla girimek için alıyosun sonra bazen yapacak bişey olmuyo ve giriyosun baktın oyunda iyi oynamaya başlıyosun devam ediyosun. Ben arkadaşlarımın ısrarıyla almıştım sarıcağını düşünmemiştim fakat acayip sarıyo kesinlikle indirimde alın 12 tl ye kaç yüz saat garantili kesin öneririm
